function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Close contact settings increase the risk of covid-19 transmission"},{"name":"Poorly ventilated indoor areas increase the risk of covid-19 transmission"},{"name":"Activities with increased particle emission raise the risk of covid-19 transmission"},{"name":"Mixing of contaminated and clean air in hybrid ventilation systems"},{"name":"Inadequate separation of heat and contaminants in displacement ventilation systems"},{"name":"Inefficient wind-driven ventilation leading to stagnant air and poor air quality"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality iaq"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation rates for controlling infection probability"},{"name":"Dependence on mechanical ventilation systems for indoor air quality control"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments due to inadequate ventilation and overcrowding"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air stagnation in confined spaces with high patient exhaled airborne viral loads"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to inadequate iaq measures"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and quarantine measures"},{"name":"Environmental pollution due to lockdown measures"},{"name":"Dependence on open windows for high ventilation rates"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive measures such as social distancing and mask-wearing"},{"name":"Rise in covid-19 cases after relaxation of preventive measures"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections due to airborne chemical and microbiological pollutants"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to occupational diseases among health care workers"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air quality leading to the ingress of pollutants into the indoor environment"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and accumulation of airborne pathogens."},{"name":"Insufficient air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution."},{"name":"Contaminated air not effectively removed"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization of air"},{"name":"Inadequate distribution of treated air"},{"name":"Unclear effectiveness of air purification technology"},{"name":"Misuse or improper maintenance of uvgi technology"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv radiation"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of uvc radiation due to virus concealment"},{"name":"The use of uvgi for disinfection may not be effective for covid-19 virus in real-life scenarios due to the virus being concealed from direct uvc light."},{"name":"The prolonged exposure to uvgi at dosages ranging from 1000 to 3000 mj/cm 2 may pose health risks to individuals if not used properly."},{"name":"The susceptibility of coronavirus to uv irradiation, while effective, may not eliminate the risk of disease transmission through other means, such as surface contamination and airborne particles."},{"name":"Use of ineffective air filters"},{"name":"Improper installation of air filters"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air filters"},{"name":"Use of hepa filters and pre-filters in built environments"},{"name":"Use of electrostatic smoke precipitators esp and electrostatic air filters es in built environments"},{"name":"Dependence on air conditioning systems for thermal comfort"},{"name":"Inadequate review of construction, design, and maintenance of hvac systems"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air supply in buildings"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration due to low merv filters"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation"},{"name":"Use of ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, and ionizers"},{"name":"Possible spread of epidemic through air conditioning systems"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tuberculosis in a hospital ward"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uv lights and ionizers in preventing tb transmission"},{"name":"Risks associated with prolonged exposure to uv lights and negative ionizers"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of tb in clinical settings"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission and occupational tb in resource-limited settings"}]}
